entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Terrace Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:51 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terrace Bay 7:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
Temperature: -3.0°C

Humidity: 36 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -16.0°C
Wind: ENE 10 km/h gust 28 km/h

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 6:07 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of ice pellets in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:07 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets changing to snow mixed with rain in the evening. Risk of freezing rain early in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 then west 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 6:07 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
